short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to disable the X-Ray feature on Prime Video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PrimeVideo X-Ray Blocker is a Chrome extension designed to disable the X-Ray feature of Amazon Prime Video. This extension allows you to turn off the X-Ray information windows that appear on the screen while watching Prime Video.
